official_title: A bill to authorize appropriations for a National Summit Conference on Education.

summary.text: Authorizes appropriations for a National Summit Conference on Education to be held within 90 days after the date of enactment of this Act. Sets forth provisions for appointment of participants to the Conference. Directs the Conference to develop recommendations in response to the findings of the National Commission on Excellence in Education and relating to specified areas of educational policy. Directs the Conference to transmit its recommendations to the Congress, and State Governors by January 1, 1984.

titles.title: A bill to authorize appropriations for a National Summit Conference on Education.
